name: (Incomplete) thinkable game jab submission
description:
This game is definitely not complete. I panicked. It was made in 8 hours for the Thinkable Game Jam. Also I this was my first ever submission on this site so I don't think I added it to the Jam correctly.

WASD or arrows to move. Left click to attack. Right click to move pets.

Known bugs as of upload: Enemies will stop spawning (oops). Animations are strange when attacking. You can fire pets out of box.

Goal: keep pets alive.
